title: Traits and Features
content: nces Subclass Feature You have built stoic barriers in your heart and mind, and cannot be charmed. Archfey (Lvl 10 Warlock Subclass) Mire the Mind Class Feature You can cast Slow with a Warlock Spell Slot Warlock Lvl 5 Sign of Ill Omen Class Feature You can cast Bestow Curse with a Warlock Spell Slot Warlock Lvl 5 Book of Ancient Secrets Class Feature You can inscribe magical rituals in your Book of Shadows. Gain the Ray of Sickness, Chromatic Orb, and Silence spells. You can cast these spells o
